website_summaries.verdict: A set of chips for casual players at a low price.
pros: This portable set of chips is a good starter set that's easy to carry around
Contains 100 2-gram plastic chips in three colors
cons: The plastic chips are of low quality and have slight color differences

customer_reviews.title: When the chips are down, the skeletons start playing
customer_reviews.text: Welp, this year's Halloween outdoor display theme is Skeletons gambling. And, really, how can you gamble without betting? So, I needed some poker chips. Bicycle, a name I grew up with (just as a card player with the family, not a gambler) caught my eye among the plethora of products out there. Of course, the chips are just perfect. Classic hard plastic with the grooved edges that make stacking a breeze. I'm pretty sure my skeletons agree, that is, when they're not being distracted by pesky skeleton animals.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey DanielsTop Contributor: BBQ Styles

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I am baffled by some of the negative reviews. I ordered this $7 pack of poker chips. I expected simple plastic poker chips in three colors that we could use to play poker instead of coins and more expensive options. The set arrived, and I got what I expected. Are they fancy? No. They cost $7. They work fine and come with a small rigid plastic case that makes it easy to store them. Again, if you pay $7, expect quality for $7. I would buy again, unless I wanted fancy chips, in which case I would buy a different set.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for tokens for our girls chores. For the money, they’re good. They work well for what we intended to use them for. They are thinner than I had expected but for the price, I can’t really complain. I do like that there are 3 different colors so I can use one color for each of my girls.
customer_reviews.author: Noel Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great for reward systems
customer_reviews.text: We use these as a reward system for my 3 children, they can earn these chips for various tasks and redeem them for things they would like. Hopefully we don't end up with a bunch of young adults with gambling problems. :)
customer_reviews.author: Linda Smith

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight chips
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased these more for a project I'm working on (needed some plain white chips). Problem though - I need ones with at least one blank/smooth center. These Bicycle chips have their logo on one side center and the company's name on the other. So scratch that. No big deal, that is what I get for buying a name brand product. They will still work for what they were intended - poker. I really haven't played cards with a pack of these chips since childhood. The chips I got seem a bit thinner than I remember them. Still, they are well made and lock together like I remember. I'm satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K. R.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Affordable quality chips
customer_reviews.text: Affordable (it wont break your wallet). Good for small gatherings of friendly Baccarat. These are good looking quality basic bidding chips. From my experience, the ratio of 1 box of chips per 4 players works best.
customer_reviews.author: Xonic

customer_reviews.title: Standard plastic chips
customer_reviews.text: Very standard plastic chips in my opinion. Nice quality for what they are. Bicycle logo on both sides, grooved edges so chips stack together without sliding around. 50 whites, 25 each of red and blue. Exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Good Chips
customer_reviews.text: Chips are lightweight but of good quality and are a consistent color. The tray they are in is flimsy and the box ripped on me when I opened it. Some duct tape around the box and I’m back in business. I keep these in the truck for impromptu poker games in the field.
customer_reviews.author: Dan F.

customer_reviews.title: I get that other people have had worse luck, but my order was fine
customer_reviews.text: Bought one box and got exactly what I ordered, exactly what was in the picture: standard plain plastic poker chips in the three plain colors. I get that other people have had worse luck, but my order was fine.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bradley Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Math and Money skill for kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my Elementary child that is learning double digit math and money counting, learning how to play 21. perfect since there is no written number on them to give them a true cash value.
customer_reviews.author: Magicwithin

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, 3 colors, chips the same sizes. Basic function... Nothing wrong with them.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A Spencer

customer_reviews.title: happy to get
customer_reviews.text: Bought for ladies at a nursing home ....use as bingo chips ...happy to get them
customer_reviews.author: June A. Wedeking

customer_reviews.title: Chip Declare
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what you would expect for the price and I'm in no way disappointed with the quality or construction. I had these shipped to an APO/FPO military address, they get a lot of use and have provided hours of entertainment. I last ordered these in March of 2015 and paid $6.69.
customer_reviews.author: Sam-I-Am

customer_reviews.title: Good, Cheap, Poker Chips
customer_reviews.text: If you're in the market for cheap poker chips, you can't go wrong with these. They are sturdy, stack nicely, and the colors aren't dull.
customer_reviews.author: I. Hunsberger

customer_reviews.title: Nice chips. I purchased these to help a second ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice chips. I purchased these to help a second grader just learning addition and subtraction. It helped her see the problem and she has been making rapid progress.
customer_reviews.author: D Redding

customer_reviews.title: Great classroom resource
customer_reviews.text: Great classroom resource. I use these for so many different things in my classroom, from counters, manipulative, and a token for student numbers. These are durable, and what I expected as a chip.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Kovach

customer_reviews.title: bit expensive
customer_reviews.text: Ok poker chips. I made the mistake of thinking that a deck of cards came with this because of the bicycle package. It is only poker chips and actually I would buy them probably at Walmart if I could because the price was rather high for 100 plastic pieces. I gave four stars because of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K. Sither

customer_reviews.title: Thin, cheap
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived very damaged and missing a chip. Cheap price, these are super thin. Ended up buying better for a barely higher price at wally world.
customer_reviews.author: Justthe2ofus

customer_reviews.title: Just like it was years ago.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for years. Years ago you could find these any where in any store. . No longer. . . I like these plastic ones because you can wash them. We use them on game boards we have made our self and put different stickers in the middle. This was a great price and arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Would have been nicer had the red and blue chips ...
customer_reviews.text: Would have been nicer had the red and blue chips come with the same amount as the white.... though I knew this when I bought it so should have just bought another pack. :)
customer_reviews.author: Adam Metcalf

customer_reviews.title: Poker Chips
customer_reviews.text: These are ideal for teaching my 6 year old grandson math skills.
customer_reviews.author: Hedley W. Davies

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for playing Black Jack with my family! The price was right, doesn't have to be fancy and a lot better than pennies! Now if we could just get my 7 yr old granddaughter to stop beating us! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Temrice

customer_reviews.title: I use these for place value teaching math. Whites ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these for place value teaching math. Whites are 1's. Blue 10's and Red 100's. My son likes working with different materials. They work well.
customer_reviews.author: researching mom

customer_reviews.title: My kids love them to play poker with
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. My kids love them to play poker with.
customer_reviews.author: gypsyluna

customer_reviews.title: They do their job!
customer_reviews.text: These are thin pieces, but they are still hard plastic and will not break. Are they perfect for a snooty poker session with super judgmental people? Maybe not. They are cheaper looking pieces. But they serve their purpose for anyone just wanting poker chips that work.
customer_reviews.author: Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Great for your three-year-old!
customer_reviews.text: We used these as a reward to help my kid go to the bathroom. It seemed to work, but now, he's obsessed with poker. The therapy to cure his addiction has been expensive, but he poops on his own, so I shouldn't complain. Therapy is cheaper than carpet cleaners. So it's thanks to these chips that he's independent and confident, albeit a little obsessed.
customer_reviews.author: AH2113

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: a good product. reasonable price. arrived on time and in good condition. thank you.
customer_reviews.author: paul reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Good value poker chips.
customer_reviews.text: Nice chips. Good value. Plastic but sturdy. I wrote the dollar amount on the chips. Plan on buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Joymika

customer_reviews.title: A lot cheaper than "official" chips..
customer_reviews.text: Very good value... tend to stick together occasionally, but not enough to complain about!
customer_reviews.author: Dan P.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Got them to use in tripoley game to supplement additional players. They worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive plastic chips as promised!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted inexpensive plastic chips as these were described. They are perfect for occasional use and will probably last forever. If you have ever received chips as part of an standard board game, these are probably from the same manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: JLG

customer_reviews.title: Great for BINGO
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to use for large card Bingo at an assisted living facility. The residents really appreciate the grip of the chips. They are easy to disinfect after each game, and easy for the residents to grab and place on the board.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie G

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted for class experiments
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for classroom games, though these will do nicely for poker.
customer_reviews.author: John Schuyler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a friend that plays poker with friends
customer_reviews.author: Mary Draeger

customer_reviews.title: Adequate for home play
customer_reviews.text: Completely acceptable chips for home play. No special fault that I can see. However, the price is a bit too high. They should be 2-3$ not 5-6$
customer_reviews.author: Roshan

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The chips were nice and smooth and had no rough edges or excess flashing. They are a good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: great, bought for my grand daughter because she wants ...
customer_reviews.text: great, bought for my grand daughter because she wants my pocket change like her brother but afraid she may put real coins in her mouth. this serves me well for what i bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: john w. smith

customer_reviews.title: Missing one white chip
customer_reviews.text: Was missing one white chip, otherwise their exactly what I'd expect for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lester Kroeger

customer_reviews.title: almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: you getting exactly just like what' on the picture! the chips dont look cheap to me, it looks like the one on the picture! my only complain is the chips is a little too thin and a little too light. i used to the casino chips which is a bit thicker and a bit heavier.
customer_reviews.author: K. Li

customer_reviews.title: I used the chips as counters when teaching my kids ...
customer_reviews.text: I used the chips as counters when teaching my kids math. They had a lot of uses besides that. I slipped them down into my kids ninja warrior truck and they functioned as flying projectiles, replacing the original lost discs.
customer_reviews.author: ImprovJ

customer_reviews.title: Good value, standard quality as expected
customer_reviews.text: Good value, standard quality as expected. Amazon makes it so easy to put together a one stop, "everything you need for the party" order!
customer_reviews.author: JOHN MORRIS CANTILLON

customer_reviews.title: Just fine.
customer_reviews.text: Everything came as expected, in tact and not damaged. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos M.

customer_reviews.title: Chips for Classroom activities
customer_reviews.text: After reviewing several other chip product, I decided to purchase the Bicycle Pokers chips. I received them in a timely fashion (just prior to the new school year). The product matched the online description. There was no damage to the package or the product. The chips will be used in the classroom as apart of a Kagan strategy. Chips (relative) size: approximately the size of a 1/2 dollar. Each chip is thin (thinner than a quarter) but sturdy with an interlocking feature. I would recommend this product for purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J Brice

customer_reviews.title: Chips are nice, but not the same size as others
customer_reviews.text: Why are chip sizes never mentioned?! I have now seen at least four different sizes and am not happy that they don't match.
customer_reviews.author: LarLyn

customer_reviews.title: It'll Work
customer_reviews.text: Works for what I needed, but the chips are SO cheap and thin.
customer_reviews.author: HannahS

customer_reviews.title: Poker Chips
customer_reviews.text: Love my poker chips! Great for my themed bday party!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The plastic chips were great cause they are light weight and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: I needed chips for a family game we made up. The plastic chips were great cause they are light weight and inexpensive...not like heavy poker chips. And we needed just the 3 colors.
customer_reviews.author: badcat

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This product wasn't bad. The chips aren't paper thin (like novelty chips are). They are also not thick like casino chips. The price also was not too bad for what you get. I would like it better if they offered packs of just red or white or blue.
customer_reviews.author: ToGo48

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The spouse wanted these so bad! Good price for something to stash in a drawer!!
customer_reviews.author: mykat

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Just what it says it is. 100 Poker chips in three colors. Couldn't beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as I expected, thanks
customer_reviews.text: Hey, these are decent quality chips for the price. Nothing fancy, but just as expected. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Erin A Muldoon

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: When the chips are down lift your mood with a game of cards and some Bicylce brand poker chips 👍

customer_reviews.title: Fun collection of chips.
customer_reviews.text: Fun collection of chips to play cards with. We bought a few packs. They are great.
customer_reviews.author: MomReaderShopperNJ

customer_reviews.title: Poker Chips
customer_reviews.text: poker chips are O K but a little lightweight and tend to slip off each other when stacked. A little extra weight would be fine. Otherwise a good buy. Havin Fun

customer_reviews.title: small chips
customer_reviews.text: They will be ok for what I need them for but they do not match the others which are bigger. Wished I'd known!

customer_reviews.title: good chips
customer_reviews.text: Good, basic poker chips for my boys to use with games.

customer_reviews.title: These are very much like the ones we already had
customer_reviews.text: Needed some new chips for a game. These are very much like the ones we already had. Just what I wanted.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect transaction. Received exactly what was described in perfect condition in a timely manner. Would highly recommend to anyone needing poker chips for games or crafts.

customer_reviews.title: Fulfills its purpose
customer_reviews.text: I got these to use as a reward/payment system with my kids rather than having nickles, dimes, and quarters always handy. It fulfills its purpose perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a non-traditional use

customer_reviews.title: my grandson loved these. We have great fun with them
customer_reviews.text: my grandson loved these. We have great fun with them. Would purchase agagin

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Tripoly game in which we were always having to exchange chips due to a shortage of white ones. This is a nice set of poker chips.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Chips were thinner than I was expecting, but they matched in color and pattern and they interlocked with each other, and at the end of the day, that's all I really wanted.

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Just flimsy--not as easy to hold or separate as the thicker chips

customer_reviews.title: Good price for this many chips
customer_reviews.text: Good price for this many chips. I just wanted simple plastic chips at a good price. This was exactly what I wanted

customer_reviews.title: Still the Same
customer_reviews.text: Looked everywhere for these and only found online. Needed extra plastic poker chips and these were just as I remembered playing with as a child. Perfect for extra Tripoly chips.
customer_reviews.author: elainen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These chips were just what I wanted, plain with no embellishments.
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: We enjoy them very much
customer_reviews.text: These arrived in new condition, just as described. We enjoy them very much. We would definitely reorder from this seller.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got here so fast and it is exactly what I needed for my Game night...thank you

customer_reviews.title: Poker Chips
customer_reviews.text: These are the the best poker chips -- good color, size and weight. Great product and the price is good too!

customer_reviews.title: It's a plastic chip
customer_reviews.text: They are sturdy chips but what's not to like...It's plastic chip and it serves the purpose it was purchased for.

customer_reviews.title: Good chips.  As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Good poker chips for the price. Fast service a n shipping.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Low cost poker chips that last a long time, same as I have had before.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for and a good price.

customer_reviews.title: Chips appeared dirty
customer_reviews.text: These appeared to have been used - the box they came in appeared damaged and several of the chips were dirty and could't be used. Had I not needed them for a school project the next day, I would have returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Farm girl

customer_reviews.title: super thin chips
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed at how super-thin these chips are. They are see-through they are so thin. They are sturdy, however.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect choice for poker, counting practice, everything! Who doesn't need poker chips?
customer_reviews.author: D. Keenan

customer_reviews.title: The Number of each Color is NOT Correct
customer_reviews.text: The chips will serve their purpose and work fine. The problem is with the count. So, buyer beware. If you need a specific number of each color, do not count on this being correct. I would recommend ordering an extra box (which of course means more money to the manufacturer, which may be the plan anyway). I ordered 2 boxes and neither box had the correct number in them. I needed 50 red and neither box had 25 red as specified.
customer_reviews.author: WP

customer_reviews.title: Poker face
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this purchase, I did order two sets to have enough chips to really play games but the chips are about the size of a quarter the colors look good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for game night
customer_reviews.text: These are cheap and they are thin but they are fully functional and don’t do anything to hinder playing a good game of poker once a week or so. I don’t have any complaints about these.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Shmilosky

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, good quality I’m very happy with this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price. Perfect for playing cards with the kids.

customer_reviews.title: Nice chips
customer_reviews.text: Came in nice package and is exactly what you expect it to be. I am using these with my students and every time they answer a question in class they get a chip and at the end of class they turn the chips back into me for XP in Classcraft.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyJames

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you expect
customer_reviews.text: They are not fancy, but I wanted a lot of poker chips for not a lot of money, so these were the perfect option.

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My family used these last night to play a game and they were perfect. My young niece commented that they were the colors of the American flag- a huge bonus!

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, decent, useful plastic chips
customer_reviews.text: Yep. They are definitely poker chips. Not much to else to say... Bought in order to use as "incentive money" in an after school program. They are fulfilling the purchase for which they were bought adequately.

customer_reviews.title: Adequate for what I need
customer_reviews.text: I'm not using these for card playing, and would be disappointed if I were - they're thin and very cheap. I use them for tokens my kid can earn for doing chores. They're right-sized and right-priced for my simple needs. And if I were inviting friends over for a game of poker I'd be embarrassed to pull these out as chips!

customer_reviews.title: Fun little package for a dinner party with friends.

product_meta.title: Bicycle Poker Chips - 100 count with 3 colors
product_meta.description: Playing Cards Accessory The 2 gram box of Bicycle Poker chips is about the size of a deck of Poker cards. The 100 chips include 50 ivory chips, 25 red chips and 25 blue chips. Compact and easy to take with you, the 2 gram box of chips also makes it easy to replace lost Poker chips.
feature_bullets: Manufactured With Recycled & Sustainably Sourced Raw Materials
100% Satisfaction Guarantee Backed By Over 50 Years As America's Oldest Jigsaw Puzzle Company
The 100 chips include 50 ivory chips, 25 red chips and 25 blue chips
About the size of a deck of Poker cards
